description: Bitbake recipe fragment defining the build and installation process for bluez5, a Linux Bluetooth stack userland components. It includes configuration options, dependencies, source URIs, build instructions, and package definitions.

methods.name: get_noinst_tools_paths
methods.description: Generates a list of paths for the no-inst tools to be installed, based on the NOINST_TOOLS variable.

methods.name: do_compile_ptest
methods.description: Compiles the test suite for bluez5 by running 'oe_runmake buildtests'.

methods.name: do_install_ptest
methods.description: Installs the test suite to the PTEST_PATH directory, removing object files.
